Created: Jun. 17th, 2009

Got some time to kill? Want to laugh? Check these

Tags:Blogs, funny

 

  • Cool Infographics

    Via cartaxo

    Who doesn't love a infographic?!?

  • ZooBorns

    Via bgm@deflint

    Less funny, and more unbearably adorable! Baby zoo animals, with lots of pics, and videos!

  • Awkward Family Photos

    The best of the worst family moments immortalized on the intertubes.

  • The "Blog" of "Unnecessary" Quotation Marks
  • Doing it Wrong
  • I'mma let you finish

    The blog inspired by the great Kanye meme of the MTV Video Awards 2009

  • Passive Agressive Notes

    "painfully polite and hilariously hostile writings from shared spaves the world over"

  • My Drunk Pics from Last Night

    Funny pics of people who have had at least one too many

  • Avoid the Job
  • My First Fail

    A FAILblog just for babies!

  • Fun with Craigslist

    Adding flame to the fire, a guy finds wacky craigslist postings, and sends them even wackier emails. He posts the entire email conversations for our reading pleasure

  • Cute Overload

    More cuteness than you can handle!

  • Fuck You Penguin

    Telling cute animals what's what

  • LOL Cats

    Cheezeburgerz and kittehs

  • This is why you are fat

    The craziest food inventions that do one thing well: Get you fat!
